name: @smithery-ai/postgres
description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides read-only access to PostgreSQL databases. This server enables LLMs to inspect database schemas and execute read-only queries.

tools.name: checkpoint
tools.title: Checkpoint Management
tools.description: Manage database checkpoints for safe experimentation. Start checkpoint mode to enable undo/redo capabilities.

action.description: Action to perform: 'start' (begin checkpoint mode), 'list' (show checkpoints), 'rollback' (undo to checkpoint), 'commit' (save changes), 'discard' (throw away all changes)

checkpointId.description: Checkpoint ID to rollback to (only used with 'rollback' action)

tools.name: query
tools.title: Execute PostgreSQL Query
tools.description: Run read-only SQL queries (SELECT privilege) - Role: read
